en.title: Accountant – Order-to-Cash (Internship Applicant)
en.statementText: Analytical accountant with 18+ years hands-on experience across Order-to-Cash (O2C), accounts receivable, credit control and master-data governance for trading and industrial SMEs. Expert user of ERP/finance suites (Visma, 1C ERP, SAP FI) and MS Office (Excel Power Query, VBA). Proven record of accelerating cash collection ↑ 20%, reducing overdue receivables ↓ 15% and building collaborative workflows with Sales & Customer-Service teams. Fluent in English (B2) and Swedish (B1). Eager to bring strong process mindset and customer focus to SKF's global finance hub.

workItems.title: Business Development / Finance Consultant
workItems.description:
• Designed unified AR dashboards (Excel Power BI) → aged-debtor visibility ↑ 100%
• Automated reminder & dunning letters in Visma/ERP; average DSO ↓ 8 days
• Trained sales teams (20+ users) on credit limits, dispute coding and cash-application rules

workItems.title: Owner / CFO
workItems.description:
• Managed full O2C cycle: credit vetting, invoicing, cash application, dispute resolution
• Implemented 1C ERP module 'Trade + AR'; manual postings ↓ 70%
• Maintained customer master data for 250 accounts; pricing & tax codes 100% accurate
• Collaborated daily with Sales & Logistics to release blocked orders and secure revenue flow

workItems.title: Freelance Accounting Consultant
workItems.description:
• Set up AR ledgers for 15 SMEs; configured payment terms & ageing reports in ERP
• Developed Excel-based cash-collection tracker adopted by all clients
• Delivered workshops on IFRS 9 impairment and bad-debt provisioning
